problems.title: Allocate 2D Array
problems.description: Dynamically allocate a 2D array, fill it, print it, and properly deallocate.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: r c (rows and columns)
Next r lines: c space-separated integers

problems.title: Transpose Matrix Dynamically
problems.description: Allocate 2D matrix, create transposed matrix dynamically, print, deallocate both.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: r c (rows and columns)
Next r lines: c space-separated integers

problems.title: Sum of Each Row in 2D Array
problems.description: Allocate 2D array dynamically, calculate sum of each row, deallocate.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: r c (rows and columns)
Next r lines: c space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print r lines, each containing sum of that row

problems.title: Matrix Multiplication
problems.description: Allocate two matrices and result matrix dynamically, multiply, print result, deallocate all.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: r1 c1
Next r1 lines: c1 integers
Next line: r2 c2 (where c1 = r2)
Next r2 lines: c2 integers

problems.title: Resize Dynamic Array
problems.description: Allocate array, resize to new size, copy old elements, fill rest with 0, deallocate old, print new, deallocate new.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (original size)
Second line: n integers
Third line: newSize

problems.title: Find Max in 2D Array
problems.description: Allocate 2D array dynamically, find maximum element, deallocate.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: r c (rows and columns)
Next r lines: c space-separated integers

problems.title: Diagonal Sum of Square Matrix
problems.description: Allocate square matrix dynamically, calculate both diagonal sums, deallocate.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (matrix size)
Next n lines: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print primary diagonal sum, then secondary diagonal sum

problems.title: Rotate Matrix 90 Degrees
problems.description: Allocate square matrix, create rotated matrix (90° clockwise), print, deallocate both.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (matrix size)
Next n lines: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Merge Sorted Arrays
problems.description: Allocate two sorted arrays and result array, merge them sorted, deallocate all.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (size of array 1)
Second line: n sorted integers
Third line: m (size of array 2)
Fourth line: m sorted integers

problems.title: Search in 2D Array
problems.description: Allocate 2D array, search for element, return position, deallocate.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: r c (rows and columns)
Next r lines: c space-separated integers
Last line: target element

problems.title: Column Sum in 2D Array
problems.description: Allocate 2D array, calculate sum of each column, deallocate.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: r c (rows and columns)
Next r lines: c space-separated integers

problems.title: Filter Positive Numbers
problems.description: Allocate array, create new array with only positive numbers, print, deallocate both.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Swap Rows in Matrix
problems.description: Allocate 2D matrix, swap two rows, print, deallocate.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: r c (rows and columns)
Next r lines: c space-separated integers
Last line: row1 row2 (0-indexed)

problems.title: Boundary Elements of Matrix
problems.description: Allocate 2D matrix, extract boundary elements to 1D array, print, deallocate both.

First line: r c (rows and columns)
Next r lines: c space-separated integers

First line: r c (rows and columns)
Next r lines: c space-separated integers

problems.title: Identity Matrix Creation

problems.title: Spiral Order of Matrix
problems.description: Allocate 2D matrix, create 1D array with spiral order elements, print, deallocate both.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: r c (rows and columns)
Next r lines: c space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print elements in spiral order, space-separated

problems.title: Add Two Matrices
problems.description: Allocate two matrices and result matrix, add them, print result, deallocate all.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: r c (rows and columns)
Next r lines: c integers (matrix 1)
Next r lines: c integers (matrix 2)

problems.title: Jagged Array Creation
problems.description: Create a jagged array where each row has different size, fill, print, deallocate properly.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (number of rows)
Next n lines: first integer is row size, followed by that many integers

sampleTestCases.explanation: Jagged array with varying row sizes
